description:
doc/go_spec: cap doesn't apply to maps
Fixes issue 4682.

messages.text: On 21 January 2013 16:06, wrote: > The length of a nil slice, map, or channel is 0. The > capacity of a nil slice or channel is 0. > That may actually be the better edit.
LGTM. Thanks for fixing this so quickly.

PTAL. On 2013/01/21 05:12:44, adg wrote: > On 21 January 2013 16:06, wrote: > > The length of a nil slice, map, or channel is 0. The > > capacity of a nil slice or channel is 0. > That may actually be the better edit. Adopted, thanks.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

https://codereview.appspot.com/7094062/diff/5001/doc/go_spec.html File doc/go_spec.html (right): https://codereview.appspot.com/7094062/diff/5001/doc/go_spec.html#newcode4925 doc/go_spec.html:4925: The length and capacity of a nil slice or channel are 0. What about the less elegant. The length of a nil slice, map, or channel is 0. The capacity of a nil slice or channel is 0.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=073d912321cc ***

doc/go_spec: cap doesn't apply to maps
Fixes issue 4682.

R=golang-dev, adg, dave
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7094062

subject: code review 7094062: doc/go_spec: cap doesn't apply to maps
